overview: A Charity Livestream recorded on the 5th of December 2020. Two of the best upcoming bands in Britain at the time collaborate to make just over an hours worth of music split into two parts. The first containing musical jams, and one original song which featured on the 2022 album of the year 'Ants From Up There', and the second half, containing purely covers.
title: Black Midi, New Road - 2020 Livestream
